title: Disney Plus, Hulu, and HBO Max are all over 60 percent off for Cyber Monday
summary: You can stream Pluribus, Severance, and other terrific Apple TV shows starting at just $5.99 a month for a limited time. The holidays are a great time to see family, exchange gifts, and enjoy a good meal. It’s also the perfect time to gather around a TV and catch up on must-see shows and movies. Vi…

title: Top 10 trending phones of week 48
summary: The OnePlus 15 golder run came to an end in week 48, the champion from the past four editions of the chart sinking all the way to fourth place.
